parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description:
Direction

Valid value:

*   IN: inbound.
*   OUT: the outbound.

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The start time. The default value is 5 minutes ago.

parameters.name: MetricName
parameters.description:
Metric

Valid value:

*   totalPacketsRate: Total Packet Rate.
*   dropBytesRate: the of the stream drop rate.
*   dropPacketsRate: Dropped Packet Rate.
*   totalBytesRate: the total streaming rate.
*   passBytesRate: by stream rate.
*   passPacketsRate: by packet rate.

parameters.name: To
parameters.description: The end time. The default time is the current time.
